Thunder Cap for Lightning Pen - Silicon Tether Lint Guard Replacement 2pk
products.description:
Thunder Cap - Silicon Tether Lint Guard
\n
\n
\nThe thunder cap is a silicon tether with a cap to keep the top closed off in between uses.
\nThis allows for better pocket storage by preventing lint or keys from entering the top while in your pocket.
\nThe silicon covering the top also helps when needing to remove the top while it is hot.
\nYou will receive two thunder caps in this purchase.
\nYou can purchase the thunder cap bundled with the Lightning Pen here.
\nFor spare heaters, spacers or parts for the lightning pen click here
\nÂ 
\n
\n
\n
\nRebuilding, Using, & Cleaning for the Lightning Pen w/ Thunder Cap
\nCLEAN & LUBE YOUR O-RINGS DAILY WITH A VEG OIL OF YOUR CHOICE
\nTake immediate caution: The ceramicÂ heater cup can reach up to 600Â°F and can cause serious burns. Please exercise caution when handling the unit. The heater is replaceable and can be rebuilt; there is no need to discard the whole pen if the heater breaks. We designed this with eco-friendly concepts in mind.
\nLOAD SMALL (1 to 2 hits max) DRAW SLOW to avoid splashing out of cup, This is a very small cup
\n
\n  Qtip after each sesh
\n  Loosen heater wire lead screws
\n  Lift heater cup from base
\n  GENTLE Do not use force
\n  Do not torch clean ceramic heater or metal base
\n  The highest heat setting when fully charged has enough power to burn off clean the cup, use precaution and allow to cool after three 15 second intervals. Hold Pen upside down for best results when cleaning
\n
\nAgain when using the Lightning Pen load a smaller amount than normal, this was designed for small quick sessions
\n
\n  5 clicks Power On/Off
\n  3 clicks to cycle through heat settings
\n  2 clicks to initiate 15 second autofire (we donâ€™t recommend going more than three 15 sec intervals for each session)
\n  Allow device to completely cool down between sessions
\n  As 900mAh battery gets low you will need to go up in temp to maintain the same results
\n
\nÂ 
\n
\n
\n
\nAdditional Questions or Concerns
\n
\n  Be sure to check out our YouTube page for instructional videos. Also be sure to check out our forum on Reddit or our Discord. We are an active community with many users ready to help out.
\n  As always feel free to contact matt@ineedhemp.com with any issue.Â 
\n  Bulk orders visit www.szcrossing.com.
\n

Divine Crossing XL v5 Rebuildable Concentrate Heater
products.description:
âœ¨ Divine Crossing XL v5 Ceramic Heater âœ¨





ğŸ”¥âœ¨ Check out the Divine Crossing XL V5 Rebuildable Concentrate Heater ğŸ”¥âœ¨

We took everything you love about the original V5 and made it even better. The XL ceramic heater cup fits right onto your existing setup, so thereâ€™s no hassle. Thicker leads mean itâ€™s tougher, and the taller metal top boosts airflow for those smooth, flavorful hits you crave. Plus, the bigger cup walls make cleanup a breeze â€“ no more splashing! ğŸ§¼







ğŸŒ€ Upgrade Further with an All-Glass Vortex Top

Each kit includes a complementary glass top specially designed for the XL cup, we prefer a 14mm glass vortex top with a 4mm tube which will be added to the order unless otherwise specified. ğŸªŸ

This top enhances your experience with optimized airflow. If youâ€™d prefer a different option, let us know when placing your order. ğŸ“

For those looking to customize further, you can also opt for extra glass vortex top. It takes airflow up a notch, giving you an even better experience. Go ahead, make your V5 the best it can be! ğŸš€







âš ï¸ Instructions & Maintenance

Take Immediate Caution: Ceramic heater cups can reach temperatures of up to 600Â°F and may cause serious burns. Please be careful when handling the unit. ğŸ”¥

Each part can be replaced, and the entire unit can be rebuilt. There is no need to discard the whole assembly if one part breaks; we designed it with eco-friendly concepts in mind. ğŸŒ¿

The V5 side and bottom heated ceramic cup with vortex airflow is temperature-controlled, making it the most effective way to conserve and experience concentrates while allowing for maximum vapor at the lowest temperatures. ğŸ’¨



ğŸ”‹ Take Note of Battery/Mod Settings





  Wattage: 27-37W (Pulsing button) ğŸ’¡





  TCR Value: 200, using 36W to reach 500Â°F ğŸŒ¡ï¸





Ultimately, you will want to practice to get the best experience. Some mods produce more power than others at the same settings. To preserve the side and bottom heated ceramic cups, start at a low setting and gradually work your way up to find a happy middle ground of flavor and clouds. â˜ï¸







ğŸ“– How to Use

Always keep your O-rings clean and lubricated with a vegetable oil of your choice. This makes it easier to remove the top. Place a small amount (2-5 hits max) of concentrate into the side and bottom heated ceramic cup. Keep the unit upright throughout the entire session; do not tip it, or the concentrate will pour out of the cup. Press the button on the mod to start heating the cup and allow the concentrate to boil and vaporize. Now draw slowly; this will allow for maximum vapor and conserve concentrates in the cup from splashing out. Make sure to maintain heat on the cup so that vapor is produced throughout the session. Sessions should not exceed one minute. â±ï¸

Keep the temperatures low enough to avoid burning the concentrates to a char (dry). ğŸ”¥

Always use a Q-tip to clean the cup after each session to maintain cleanliness and performance. Wipe down and clean the glass top while itâ€™s still warm to avoid reclaim buildup in the vapor pathway. Allow the unit to cool down for 3 minutes before the next session. ğŸ§¼







ğŸ”§ Installing and Maintaining Your Ceramic Heater

Under the right settings, both the standard and XL cups should last a long time. When a ceramic heater cup goes out or the resistance rises, you can replace it by unscrewing the two screws that hold the cup's lead wires fastened to the deck. Loosen the screws, gently pull out the cup, and remove it. ğŸ”©

Every now and then, youâ€™ll want to burn off residue on the cup. Set your mod to 38W in wattage mode (this can be less for some mods; always start low and see). Hold the unit upside down while delivering only two minutes of heat to the cup, then STOP and allow it to cool completely before the next cleaning session. ğŸ§¼







ğŸ Kit Includes







  Complete XL v5 assembled (ready to go) ğŸš€

  1 extra XL v5 side and bottom ceramic heater cup ğŸ”„

  1 extended all steel v4 top ğŸ› ï¸

  Dab tool ğŸ§°









  4 extra screws, tool and o-rings ğŸ”©

  Cotton swabs and alcohol wipes ğŸ§¼

  Instruction Manual ğŸ“œ











ğŸŒ Additional Questions or Concerns â“



  Be sure to check out our YouTube channel for instructional videos. Also, check out our forum on Reddit. We are an active community with many users ready to help out. ğŸ“¹

  As always feel free to contact matt@ineedhemp.com with any issues. ğŸ“§

products.description:
Quest Lightning Diffuser Kit

THE QUEST LIGHTNING







Introducing the Quest Lightning: The Innovative Diffuser with Side-Heated Cup Design,

Experience unparalleled convenience with easy cup replacement and high-quality performance. The Lightning's innovative side-heated cup design ensures even heating and consistent results, while the 14mm male-shaped top allows for hydratube attachments.

New Glass Vortex Tops: We now offer newly produced glass vortex tops designed specifically for the Quest Lightning, an extra can be purchased to be included with your kit. These tops feature higher tubes to work perfectly with the taller cups, enhancing your diffusion experience. Replacement vortex tops can be purchased under a separate link here.



Getting Started with the Quest Lightning:



  Attach the Quest Base: Securely connect the Quest base to your power supply

  Set Your Power Supply: Choose between Temperature Mode (TCR 125) or Wattage Mode (pulse button with 25w power). Skip for EZ Power Supply.

  Load the Concentrate: Place a small amount of your preferred concentrate into the heating cup.

  Secure the Top: Ensure the O-rings are clean and well-lubricated with vegetable oil for easy removal and attachment.

  Cleanliness is Key: Always clean the cup thoroughly with a Q-tip after each use.



Optimal Performance and Longevity:





  Regular Cleaning: Maintain your Quest Lightning's peak performance by wiping it down with rubbing alcohol wipes and lubricating the O-rings frequently.

  Enhance Your Experience: We offer a wide range of accessories to elevate your experience.

  Customer Service: Our dedicated team is here to assist you with any inquiries or support needs.

products.description:
V5 CUB with DNA mod customized kit includes:



- Modified V5 CUB

- Black Silicone Drip Tip

- DNA (battery not included)

- V5 Tuned eScribe Material

- All testing data

- Exclusive Collab Sticker



Seedmass has collaborated with DVT to release a new kit for Lost Vape Grus, which will have monthly drops of 10-20 units. This kit is designed for beginners who want to experience the best without having to tune and use the v5 themselves.



please get in touch to ask and questions or purchase



My website is https://seedmass.dev and email seed@seedmass.dev



A few significant changes have been made to the CUB, including a cut-off metal knurled rim for more accuracy when tuning with temperature probes and brass screws that are ground flat. The tuning process is done using five custom high-accurate platinum PT100 probes, which allows for mapping the surface of each v5 using cubic interpolation. All of this information is used to create a custom material profile that DNA uses.



The V5 is a staple of what makes Divine Tribe so great! It's perfect for users who want the best possible experience without having to tune it in themselves. This can be confusing for beginners and take some trial and error. Having the heater pre-tuned takes the guesswork out of the V5.



Seedmass highly recommends picking up the Hubble Bubble for water filtration, and all replacement parts can be purchased from ineedhemp.com. The choice of either Thelma or Hyperion, which both support 21700/18650 batteries, is also available. Make sure to purchase a high-discharge battery like the Molicel P42A. The Hyperion is rated IP68, which means it's waterproof, dustproof, and shock-resistant to IP68 standards.



This drop will open at 1 AM on March 3rd EST with only 10 units. It will be a pre-order with shipping by the end of March. All future drops will not be pre-order and will ship within the same week of order. Only 7 drops will be done for this collab: March, April, May, September, October, November, and December, after which no more units will be sold.



100% of profits go back into the company to allow for the development of cutting-edge technology. Currently, Seedmass is working on high-end rosin presses and an open-source box mod for the v5. Additionally, a tutorial series about the v5 will be added to the website, going through the ins and outs of the v5 cleaning and usage, not just for DNA, but also for Arctic Fox and maybe even the Pico 2.



Thank you to all of the dudes on discord especially OGTechWiki!

\nWe recommend the Pico power supply for this heater for the most convenient set-up and use. Here is the link to the full kit.

\n
\n  Complete V3 with 13mm donut installed ready to go

\n  Dab tool and Screwdriver
\n  5 extra screws
\n  Alcohol wipes
\n
\nThank you for your interest in the Divine Crossing Version 3 ceramic rebuildable atomizer and taking the step away from metal coil heaters to something cleaner.Â I believe in tasting the terpenes in my concentrates without a metallic flavor.Â This is the third collaboration between Shenzhen Crossing and Divine Tribe, we have exchanged drafts and ideas to create a unique diffusion device. Here are a few instructions I would like to pass along to make your experience better.
\n
\nIf your battery has a temperature control option please Temperature Control in Ni (Nickel Mode)
\n
\nI have noticed 100x better experience with temperature control rather than just wattage mode.
\n
\n-SET THE BATTERY FIRST-
\n
\nFirst time using the device start at the lowest wattage or temperature depending on your mod and work your way up. By doing this you are testing yourheater and finding the lowest setting in order to get the best essence and biggest cloud. Â Find the middleground for the best experience. Â Â Not all people enjoy the same settings, some like it hot with huge hits some enjoy easy clouds with more flavor. Â Find your best setting through practice. Â Â If you mess around with trying to fine tune your TC settings, you should try a TCR # of around 190 if you like the temperature on the screen to match the actual donut temp. Probably will not be final, or the best settings for all users on all mods, but I'm getting great, tasty, smooth, cool clouds with TCR 190 and 380-420F, and my infrared thermometer says the donut is the same temp as the screen at those settings.
\n
\nFor more information and questions visit the DivineTribeÂ YouTube channelÂ  
\n
\nÂ 
\n
\nInstructions when using
\n
\n  Place half bb sized pieceÂ directly on donut, when hitting the vaporizer draw in lightly at first to avoid upward splatter. Hold it straight up and down, Â Not out and sideways, this will ensure you get a good hit.
\n
\n
\n  For best performance do small sessions and keep the piece clean with rubbing alcohol and a wipe.
\n
\n
\n  Do not leave in hot cars
\n
\n
\n  Do not store concentrates in device
\n
\n
\n  Clear out heater after each session
\n
\nRebuild and Cleaning instructions
\n
\n  Find clean area to work so screws do not fall to floor and get lost
\n
\n
\n  Unscrew 3 screws at base of ceramic housing
\n
\n
\n  Gently pull ceramic housing from metal base
\n
\n
\n  Unscrew both screws that hold donut wires to the 2 posts
\n
\n
\n  Gently wiggle and remove ceramic cup in an upward motion from posts
\n
\n
\n  Be careful with donut wires when removing donut coil from cup they will bend and break easy
\n
\n
\n  To Rebuild follow these steps in reverse
\n
\n
\n  Each piece can be cleaned separately withÂ rubbing alcohol and a wipe
\n

By doing this you are testing your atomizer and finding the lowest setting in order to get the best flavor and biggest cloud. Â Find the middleground for the best experience. Â Â Not all people enjoy the same settings, some like it hot with huge hits some enjoy easy clouds with more flavor. Â Find your best setting through practice. Â Â If you mess around with trying to fine tune your TC settings, you should try a TCR # of around 190 if you like the temperature on the screen to match the actual donut temp. Probably will not be final, or the best settings for all users on all mods, but I'm getting great, tasty, smooth, cool clouds with TCR 190 and 380-420F, and my infrared thermometer says the donut is the same temp as the screen at those settings.
\n
\nFor more information and questions visit the DivineTribeÂ YouTube channelÂ  
\nInstructions when using
\n
\n  Place half bb sized pieceÂ directly on donut, when hitting the vaporizer draw in lightly at first to avoid upward splatter. Hold it straight up and down, Â Not out and sideways, this will ensure you get a good hit.
\n
\n
\n  For best performance do small sessions and keep the piece clean with rubbing alcohol and a wipe.
\n
\n
\n  Do not leave in hot cars
\n
\n
\n  Do not store concentrates in device
\n
\n
\n  Clear out Atomizer after each session
\n
\nRebuild and Cleaning instructions
\n
\n  Find clean area to work so screws do not fall to floor and get lost
\n
\n
\n  Gently pull ceramic housing from metal base
\n
\n
\n  Unscrew both screws that hold donut wires to the 2 posts
\n
\n
\n  Gently wiggle and remove ceramic cup in an upward motion from posts
\n
\n
\n  Be careful with donut wires when removing donut coil from cup they will bend and break easy
\n
\n
\n  To Rebuild follow these steps in reverse
\n
\n
\n  Each piece can be cleaned separately withÂ rubbing alcohol and a wipe
\n
\nVisit

\n
\nfor wholesale orders of 50 pcs or more

products.description:
3mm, 4mm & 5mm Silicon Carbide SIC Pearls









Enhance your dabbing experience with premium Silicon Carbide (SIC) pearls designed for superior heat distribution and retention.

Available in 3mm, 4mm, and 5mm sizes with quantity options of 2 or 4 pearls per order.







âš ï¸ Important Product Information âš ï¸



PEARLS ONLY - BANGERS AND INSERTS SOLD SEPARATELY

This listing is for SIC pearls only. Bangers, inserts, and other accessories sold separately.









Available Sizes & Quantities





âš« 3mm Pearls

Perfect for smaller bangers and inserts. Ideal for precise heat distribution in compact spaces.







âš« 4mm Pearls

Versatile size suitable for most standard bangers. Excellent balance of surface area and mobility.







âš« 5mm Pearls

Larger pearls for bigger bangers and inserts. Maximum heat retention and distribution capacity.









Quantity Options: 2 or 4 pearls per order







Custom Combinations Available!

You can mix different sizes - just leave your preferred combination in the checkout notes









Technical Specifications





ğŸ“ Sizes Available

3mm, 4mm, 5mm diameter

Precision manufactured







ğŸ“¦ Quantities

2 or 4 pearls per order

Custom combinations available







ğŸ”¥ Material

Premium Silicon Carbide

Ultra-high purity grade







ğŸŒ¡ï¸ Temperature Range

Withstands extreme heat

Superior thermal stability











Why Choose Silicon Carbide Pearls?





ğŸ”¥ Superior Heat Retention

SIC retains heat longer than quartz, extending your dabbing window.







ğŸŒŠ Enhanced Distribution

Pearls create movement and spread heat evenly throughout your material.







ğŸ’ Flavor Preservation

Inert SIC material preserves pure taste without adding flavors.







ğŸ’ª Extreme Durability

Nearly indestructible material resists cracking and thermal shock.











How SIC Pearls Improve Your Experience



Silicon Carbide pearls revolutionize your dabbing sessions by:





  Creating Movement: Pearls spin and roll, continuously mixing your concentrates for even vaporization

  Extending Heat: Superior thermal mass keeps your banger at optimal temperature longer

  Reducing Waste: More efficient heat distribution means less material left behind

  Lowering Temperatures: Better heat retention allows for lower temperature dabbing

  Improving Flavor: Lower temps and inert material preserve terpene profiles









Size Selection Guide



Choosing the Right Size for Your Setup:



  3mm Pearls: Best for small bangers (under 20mm), crucibles, and tight spaces. Minimal airflow restriction.

  4mm Pearls: Ideal for standard 25mm bangers and most inserts. Perfect balance of performance and compatibility.

  5mm Pearls: Excellent for large bangers (30mm+) and when maximum heat retention is desired.

  Mixed Sizes: Combine different sizes for unique heat distribution patterns and enhanced movement.









Usage Instructions



Getting Started with SIC Pearls:



  Initial Cleaning: Rinse pearls with isopropyl alcohol before first use

  Placement: Drop pearls into your banger or insert before heating

  Heating: Heat your banger as normal - pearls will heat up with the surface

  Dabbing: Add your concentrates and watch the pearls create movement

  Airflow: Use a carb cap to create airflow that spins the pearls









Care & Maintenance



Keeping Your SIC Pearls in Perfect Condition:



  After Each Use: Allow pearls to cool completely before handling

  Regular Cleaning: Soak in isopropyl alcohol to remove residue buildup

  Deep Cleaning: Use cotton swabs with alcohol for detailed cleaning

  Torch Cleaning: SIC can handle direct flame cleaning if needed

  Storage: Store in a clean, dry container to prevent contamination

  Inspection: Check for chips or cracks regularly (though SIC rarely damages)









SIC vs Other Materials



Why Silicon Carbide outperforms other pearl materials:







vs Quartz Pearls

â€¢ Better heat retention

â€¢ Higher thermal conductivity

â€¢ More durable construction







vs Ruby Pearls

â€¢ More affordable

â€¢ Easier to clean

â€¢ No risk of chipping







vs Glass Pearls

â€¢ Superior heat resistance

â€¢ Won't break from thermal shock

â€¢ Better chemical inertness













Complete Your Setup

Enhance your dabbing experience with these complementary products:







ğŸ”¥ Core Erig Parts

Complete your Core Erig setup with replacement parts and accessories for optimal performance.

ğŸ”§ Shop Core Erig Parts â†’







ğŸ’ 30mm Inserts

SIC and Quartz inserts perfect for use with your new pearls. Available in male and female configurations.

ğŸ’ Shop 30mm Inserts â†’







ğŸ«§ Glass Accessories

Complement your setup with premium glass tops, adapters, and water cooling attachments.

ğŸ”„ Shop Glass Accessories â†’







ğŸ”Œ Extension Cables

510 extension cables in standard and magnetic options for enhanced setup flexibility.

ğŸ”— Shop Extension Cables â†’











Safety Information



ALLOW PEARLS TO COOL COMPLETELY BEFORE HANDLING

SIC pearls retain heat for extended periods. Use appropriate tools when moving hot pearls. Keep away from children and pets.

v4 & v5 Bottomless Quartz Banger and Bubble Carb Cap









These are the newly revised bottomless quartz banger that will fit the v4 and v5.

Now sold in both 90Â° & 45Â° options.

You will notice the quality of this bottomless quartz banger the second it arrives â€” smooth, clean, and made with quality.

Outer diameter of banger is 25mm.

Options include:





  Bottomless quartz banger by itself

  Bottomless quartz banger with bubble carb cap

  Bottomless quartz banger with aluminum carb cap and two 4mm SIC terp pearls

  Bottomless quartz banger with titanium carb cap and two 4mm SIC terp pearls



We recommend using the bottomless banger (bb) on a flat wide table with a dab mat, leaving yourself enough room for anything to happen. Leave yourself enough room to work since there are many moving pieces with your bb setup.

When removing your device from the bb, we always recommend holding from the base of the banger walls and the metal base of the heater you are using. Then remove the bb vertically with a small twist. Do not remove at an angle â€” otherwise you will crack the banger walls.

DO NOT HOLD THE BANGER BY THE STEM. ALWAYS HOLD FROM THE BOWL.

Always be sure your o-rings fit tight â€” the fit should never be loose. Never force the base if the o-rings appear too tight or you may break the banger. Email us about any sizing issues.

Due to mishandling, we will only guarantee these bangers up to 1 week.

Arctic Fox Installation Instructions for the Eleaf Pico 75w
products.description:
Â 







ğŸ¦Š Arctic Fox for Eleaf iStick Pico ğŸ¦Š

Installation Instructions & Firmware









âš ï¸ Compatibility Notes

ğŸš¨ This guide is for the Eleaf iStick Pico with micro USB, which supports Arctic Fox firmware upgrades. The Type-C Pico I sell has built-in autofire but is not compatible with Arctic Fox. Ensure you use a micro USB data cable.[](https://www.e-cigarette-forum.com/threads/istick-pico-75-usb-c-firmware-upgradable.985055/)









ğŸŒŸ Why Arctic Fox?

Arctic Fox transforms your Pico with up to 8 customizable profiles, autofire up to 60 seconds, precise temperature control, and preheat settings. Divine Tribe provides this open-source firmware to keep your solid-performing mod thriving! ğŸ¦Š[](https://github.com/GD386/ArcticFox)[](https://www.vaposearch.com/how-to-install-arctic-fox-firmware/)









ğŸ› ï¸ Installation Steps





1. Download NFE Tools ğŸ“¥

Download the NFE-Tools-v190703-21.46 ZIP file. If it fails, try another browser. Create an Arctic Fox folder, unzip the files, and open the nToolbox app. ğŸ“‚









2. Connect Pico ğŸ”Œ

Connect your Pico to your computer using a micro USB data cable (not all cables transmit data). In nToolbox, click Firmware Updater. ğŸ”









3. Download Firmware ğŸ“¦

Download the Pico AF Firmware BIN File to your Arctic Fox folder. ğŸ’¾







4. Optional: Stock Autofire Firmware âš™ï¸

Skip this for Arctic Fox. For stock firmware with autofire, download the Pico Autofire Firmware. Hold fire and â€œ+â€ to set seconds, double-click to activate, press once to stop early. ğŸ”§







5. Update Firmware ğŸ”„

In nToolbox, click Update From a File, select the Arctic Fox or Autofire BIN file, and upload to your Pico. âœ…













6. Load Configuration ğŸ› ï¸

Use our pre-set configuration with 3 profiles for Quest, v4, and v5 Prototype: Download Configuration. Or customize your own with these instructions. In nToolbox, click ArcticFox Configuration, select the file, and click Upload Settings. Cycle profiles by pressing the fire button 3 times. ğŸ”„















7. Autofire Feature ğŸ”¥

Arctic Foxâ€™s autofire lets you heat for up to 60 seconds with a double-click, no need to hold the button every 10 seconds like stock firmware. Perfect for Divine Tribe atomizers! ğŸŒ¿[](https://vapingunderground.com/threads/eleaf-pico-firmware-update.283859/)













ğŸŒ Join Divine Tribe

Connect with us! Watch tutorials on YouTube, join our Reddit forum, or chat on Discord. Email matt@ineedhemp.com for support. ğŸŒ¿

 ğŸŒ± Why Hemp Fabric?

 

 Hemp fabric, derived from the Cannabis sativa plant, has been used for millennia, from ancient Chinese textiles to medieval European sails. Its superior strengthâ€”four times that of cottonâ€”resists wear and tear, maintaining shape through countless washes. Unlike synthetic fibers, hempâ€™s natural properties include UV resistance, blocking harmful rays, and thermal regulation, keeping you comfortable in varied climates. Its porous fibers wick moisture, enhancing breathability, while its antimicrobial nature reduces odors without chemical treatments. Hemp grows rapidly, yielding up to 250% more fiber per acre than cotton, using minimal water and no pesticides, making it a sustainable choice. Despite these advantages, hempâ€™s popularity waned due to prohibition in the 20th century, which restricted cultivation and stigmatized the plant. Cottonâ€™s industrial dominance and cheaper production also overshadowed hempâ€™s labor-intensive processing. Today, as legal barriers ease, hempâ€™s eco-friendly, durable, and comfortable qualities are poised for a comeback, offering a superior alternative to cotton and synthetics for conscious consumers. ğŸŒ

\nLightning Heater Cups

âš™ï¸ Advanced Steel Top Design for V5, V4.5, and Cub

ğŸ”„ Four Directional Airflow Innovation

This new all steel top works with the V5, V4.5, and Cub models. Furthermore, it features a redesigned four directional airflow within the cap rather than two tubes like previous models. Additionally, this steel top provides improved airflow distribution for better performance. Moreover, the steel construction ensures durability and consistent heat management.







ğŸ”§ Two-Piece All Steel Top Design Benefits

ğŸ‘ï¸ Enhanced Viewing and Access

The steel top now separates into two pieces: the main metal slide (walls) and the cap. However, this design allows you to view your concentrates without needing to remove the walls of the top. Meanwhile, the two-piece construction makes cleaning and maintenance much easier. Therefore, you get better functionality with the same durable steel construction. Additionally, browse our complete Divine Crossing atomizer collection for compatible accessories.

Walls of the top remain in place during use

ğŸ’¨ Four Directional Airflow System

ğŸŒªï¸ Improved Airflow Distribution

The redesigned airflow system features four directional air channels instead of the previous two-tube design. Furthermore, this creates more even airflow distribution throughout the chamber. Additionally, the improved design enhances vapor production and consistency. Moreover, check out our complete atomizer accessories for additional upgrade options.







ğŸ¯ All Steel Top Drip Tip Options

ğŸ”§ Multiple Tip Configurations Available

Your steel top comes with your choice of drip tip options. However, you can also choose an additional tip for different usage preferences. Design: Two-piece separating system

Drip Tips: Steel, silicone, glass, or no tip

Maintenance: O-ring cleaning required









ğŸ› ï¸ Essential Maintenance Guidelines

ğŸ”§ O-Ring Care Instructions



Critical Maintenance Step:

Always keep your O-rings on both the base and the cap clean and lubed with vegetable oil of your choice. Furthermore, regular maintenance prevents damage and ensures smooth operation. Additionally, clean O-rings extend the life of your steel top significantly. Moreover, check out our O-ring maintenance guide for detailed care instructions.







ğŸ”§ Complete Your Setup

Pair your all steel top with our Cub accessories and concentrate tools for the ultimate setup!







Cleaning Process



  Remove O-rings carefully from base and cap

  Clean with warm water and mild soap

  Dry completely before lubrication

  Apply thin layer of vegetable oil







Lubrication Tips



  Use food-grade vegetable oil only

Replacment New Glass Tops for The Core 2.0 eRig
products.description:
Enhance Your Core Experience with Additional Tops!
\n
\n
\n
\nUpgrade your Core with our range of versatile and customizable attachments meticulously crafted glass tops designed to take your dabbing sessions to the next level. We've designed these tops with your preferences in mind, allowing you to enhance your dabbing sessions in multiple ways. Here's what you can add to your collection:
\n
\n  Recycler Top: Elevate your Core to the next level with the Recycler Top, offering improved airflow and cooler hits.
\n  Flat Top Matrix Perc: A sleek, flat design on top paired with matrix perc for superior filtration.
\n  Round Top Strait Perc: Enjoy the unique dome-shaped design on top while experiencing the benefits of a straight perc, offering a clean and pure dabbing experience.
\n  Round Top Matrix Perc: Similarly boasts a dome-shaped design on top. Additionally, it features the matrix perc for extra percolation and filtration, resulting in smoother hits.
\n  14mm Hydratube Attachment: If you already own a 14mm Hydratube, this attachment is perfect for a seamless integration, enhancing your Core's performance.
\n  18mm Hydratube Attachment: Similarly, if you have an 18mm Hydratube, this attachment is designed to fit perfectly, ensuring a superb dabbing experience.
\n  Standard Straight Perc Stock Top: The classic choice for straightforward, reliable dabbing.
\n
\nğŸŒŸ Upgrade your Core with one of our five new tops. We've listened to your feedback and are excited to introduce these new innovative variations that cater to your preferences.
\n
\n  Matrix Cyclone Recycler Top Elevate your visual aesthetics with this recycler top featuring a matrix perc. The tall cylinder body shape and a slide tube on the top chamber create a mesmerizing cyclone effect. Experience a dabbing session like never before with this unique and eye-catching design.
\n  Twin Colossal Recycler Top Immerse yourself in a world of dual chambers with the Twin Colossal Recycler Top. The straight perc design connects two large chambers side by side, delivering a colossal dabbing experience. Elevate your sessions with the power of double filtration.

products.description:
10mm 90Â° Bottomless Quartz Banger â€“ 2 Pack









This 2-pack of 10mm 90Â° Bottomless Quartz Bangers is designed specifically for the CUB and V4 using black o-rings only.

These will not work with any other versions or setups â€” CUB and V4 with black o-rings only.

You will receive two (2) bottomless quartz bangers. No carb caps, pearls, or accessories are included.

Each banger is smooth, clean,Â  precise airflow and 25mm outer diameter.

We recommend using the bottomless banger (bb) on a flat wide table with a dab mat, leaving yourself enough room for anything to happen. Leave yourself enough room to work since there are many moving pieces with your bb setup.

When removing your device from the bb, we always recommend holding from the base of the banger walls and the metal base of the heater you are using. Then remove the bb vertically with a small twist. Do not remove at an angle â€” otherwise you will crack the banger walls.

DO NOT HOLD THE BANGER BY THE STEM. ALWAYS HOLD FROM THE BOWL.

Always be sure your O-rings fit tight â€” the fit should never be loose. Never force the base if the O-rings appear too tight or you may break the banger. Please make sure to lube your O-rings Email us about any sizing issues.

Due to mishandling, we will only guarantee these bangers up to 1 week.

\nNote: This eNail comes with a coil that works only with 110V outlets. There is a special coil that makes them work with 220V outlets. If you need it, please add a note to your order asking for it. There is no extra charge. This kit now also comes with the bubble cap pictured.Â 
\n
\nNote: This eNail comes with a coil that works only with 110 V outlets. there is a special coil that makes them work with 220 V outlets, if you need it had a note to your order asking for it. There is no extra charge.
\nNOTE: this is a 120v and 250w 5 pin coil MAKE SURE YOUR OLD COIL MATCHES UP
\nKit Includes
\n
\n  Controller Box and Power cord (1 year guarantee)
\n  20mm Coil (1 year guarantee)
\n  20 mm Diameter Quartz Banger 2.5mm thick (pick size between 14mm male/18mm male or female)

\n
\nInstructions
\n
\n  To turn the eNail on and off, hold the center button for 5 seconds.
\n  To set the automatic shutoff time, press the button 5 times fast while the eNail is on and select 0-5. 0 means there is no automatic shutoff and 1-5 represent the hour until it will shut off.
\n  To adjust the temperature, use the left button to lower it and the right button to raise it.

products.description:
Electric eNail with 30mm Round Coil, Banger, Directional Airflow Bubble Carb, and Quartz Insert 
\nwith option to add the Polished SIC (silicon carbide) InsertÂ  Â 
\n
\nThis is a for theÂ  Electric eNail 30mm coil, quartz insert and carb. + option to add Polished SIC
\n
\nThis is the eNail I use myself. The airflow and flavor I get from my concentrates is unmatched on any device. I have used and sampled a good amount of nails and this one is the best to date. I love to dab daily. Terpenes from your strains are important and being able to taste the strain and have that flavor on your taste palette for 10 minute afterward is important.
\n
\nComplete eNail Wiki
\n
\nNote: This eNail comes with a coil that works only with 110 V outlets. there is a special coil that makes them work with 220 V outlets, if you need it had a note to your order asking for it. There is no extra charge.
\nNOTE: this is a 120v and 150w 5 pin coil MAKE SURE YOUR OLD COIL MATCHES UP
\nKit Includes
\n
\n  Controller Box and Power Cord (1 year guarantee)
\n  30mm Coil (1 year guarantee)
\n  14mm male - 30mm Diameter - 2mm thick - Quartz Banger and cotter pins
\n  Directional Airflow Bubble carb for Banger
\n  Quartz insert
\n  Option to add Polished SIC insert
\n
\nInstructions
\n
\n  To turn the eNail on and off, hold the center button for 5 seconds.
\n  To set the automatic shutoff time, press the button 5 times fast while the eNail is on and select 0-5. 0 means there is no automatic shutoff and 1-5 represent the hour until it will shut off.
\n  To adjust the temperature, use the left button to lower it and the right button to raise it.
\n
\nÂ 
\nAdditional Questions or Concerns
\n
\n  Be sure to check out our YouTube page for instructional videos. Also be sure to check out our forum on Reddit. We are an active community with many users ready to help out.
\n  As always feel free to contact matt@ineedhemp.com with any issue.
\n
\n

The Core 2.0 w/ Nice Dreamz Heater Coil - Portable eRig for Concentrates - Features the v5 Side and Bottom Heated Cup
products.description:
Introducing the Core 2.0 now with the Nice Dreamz coil assembly with the v5 side and bottom heated cup. An easy to use on the go piece with a fully heated high polish ceramic vaping surface. Better engineered than competing erigs on the market, in fact the unit is guaranteed for 1 year for any internal failure of any sort.
\n
\nNice Dreamz Heater Coil:Â The heart of the Core 2.0, the Nice Dreamz Heater Coil, offers an unparalleled dabbing experience. With a modified assembly style, weâ€™ve lowered the supportive metal ring around the heater cup. This clever design exposes the edges of the cup, making loading your concentrates easier than ever before. Say goodbye to wastage and hello to precision dabbing.
\n
\nNew glass top bubbler attachments for more versatility to view concentrates and keep the neck upright. Can be angled 3 different ways on the core with 3 holes placed on the bottom to match with the airhole intake on the base of the core. Check out the options below:
\n
\n  Round Top Matrix Perc
\n  Round Top Strait Perc
\n  Flat Top Matrix Perc
\n  14mm Hydratube Attachment
\n  18mm Hydratube Attachment
\n  Recycler Top
\n
\nNew tops sold separately here .
\n
\nAdditional Cub base adapter sold separately here to help clean your Core v5 heater coil assembly.
\n
\nCore 2.0 Features
\n
\nOne button functionality for ease of use ğŸ”˜
\nFully heated high polish ceramic vaping surface ğŸ”¥
\nRebuildable atomizer ğŸ”§

\n
\n
\n
\nWhat's Included
\n

\nCore 2.0 Instructions
\n
\nHold - Manual fire up to 60 seconds ğŸ”¥
\nTwo clicks - Activate session mode ğŸ”„
\nThree Clicks - Change heat setting ğŸ”¥
\n
\n
\nFour Clicks - Display power level:
\n
\n
\nğŸ”´ Low |
\nâšª Medium |
\nğŸŸ¢ Full
\n
\n
\n
\n
\nFive Clicks - Lock or unlock Core 2.0 Base ğŸ”’
\n
\n
\nSession Times and Temperatures
\nThe total session time for the Core 2.0 has been upgraded to 80 seconds, including pre-heat time.
\n
\n
\nBlue - 12.5 second pre-heat - Approx. 401Â°F ğŸ”µ
\nGreen - 13 second pre-heat - Approx. 428Â°F ğŸŸ¢
\nWhite - 17.5 second pre-heat - Approx. 464Â°F âšª
\nRed - 22.5 second pre-heat - Approx. 500Â°F ğŸ”´
\n
\n
\n
\n  Charge your base using the provided wall plug and cable.
\n  Fill bubbler from the top, when it is removed from the base. Ensure any excess liquid has been wiped away and that no water has flooded into the bottom compartment. If this happens turn the bubbler upside down and blow into the air hole at the bottom to clear this section. Then re-fill from the top.
\n  Place bubbler onto Core 2.0 Base at an angle, ensuring that the hole in the bubbler base aligns with the vapor pathway in the Core 2.0 base, then gently and firmly push it straight down into place.
\n  Check small screws in the atomizer base which hold the heater legs are fastened. These need to be tightened so they are firm, but not so much that they cut the wire legs off the heater. When this is done screw the atomizer into the Core 2.0 base.
\n  Place the carb cap tube on the base so that the wider angled side sits at the top, leaving the carp cab on the tether so that concentrate can be loaded onto the heater.
\n  Select desired heat setting (start low and work up to desired heat).
\n
\nSee Instructions included with Core 2.0 for more session and usage detailsÂ 
\nCleaning
\n
\n  Wipe out heater with a q-tip after each use
\n  Clean the area around the RDA heater weekly to stop residue building up
\n  Every month, approximately, wipe out the airway with a q-tip soaked in ISO - allow to fully dry before use
\n  Replace bubbler water daily
\n  To clean bubbler fill with hot water and shake to remove large residues. Soak in ISO to fully clean. Rinse thoroughly with warm water after soaking.
\n  RDA heater can be removed and screwed into a heat sink on a box mod, then run at 36W for 1-2 mins to perform a burn off cycle. Link for the heater coil sold separate here.
\n
